name: imdb_bulk_search
description: Search multiple movies or shows on IMDb in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling imdb_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('.ipc-metadata-list-summary-item, [class*="ipc-metadata-list-summary-item"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 5); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.ipc-title__text, a[href*="/title/"], a[href*="/name/"]'); const metaItems = el.querySelectorAll('.ipc-inline-list__item, [class*="cli-title-metadata-item"]'); let year = ''; for (const m of metaItems) { const t = m.textContent.trim(); if (/^\d{4}/.test(t)) { year = t; break; } } const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/title/"], a[href*="/name/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim().replace(/^\d+\.\s*/, '') : '', year: year, url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
